name: A Curious Pastime Demo
description:
A comedy point and click adventure game that parodies the UK larp system Curious Pastimes

Originally this was the whole game that I intended to make but with lockdown I decided to go full throttle and make a longer version, so this has been relegated to a demo :D

This is my first ever project (or attempt at any sort of coding) and it was made with the AGS engine.
Minor swearing and violence, images and text of a sexual nature.

Hope you enjoy :)
